column3: Please don't just copy doc/systemd.md. That means that updates will take double the amount of work and it's easy to forget it. Refer to it instead.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4652_6cbfed389a5c552271fcc845036473f0c5e8f705/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
See #4611, it already adds a small documentation file here.\n
